-static inline void SWIT_Sfty_Check_Input(void *value,uint16 key,uint8 type)
-{
-if((SWIT_DCHA_MAIN_KEY_ENABLE==SWIT_Dcha_Main_Key)&&(key==SWIT_KEY_Input)){
-   switch(type){
-      case SWIT_FLOAT32:
-         SWIT_Sfty_Input_hook_float32=*((float32 *)value);
-         break;
-      case SWIT_UINT8:
-         SWIT_Sfty_Input_hook_uint8=*((uint8 *)value);
-         break;
-      case SWIT_UINT16:
-         SWIT_Sfty_Input_hook_uint16=*((uint16 *)value);
-         break;
-      case SWIT_UINT32:
-         SWIT_Sfty_Input_hook_uint32=*((uint32 *)value);
-         break;
-      default:
-         break;
-   }
-   }
-}
-static inline void SWIT_Sfty_Set(void *value,uint16 key,uint8 type)
-{
-if((SWIT_DCHA_MAIN_KEY_ENABLE==SWIT_Dcha_Main_Key)&&(key==SWIT_KEY_output)){
-   switch(type){
-      case SWIT_FLOAT32:
-         *((float32 *)value)=SWIT_Sfty_Output_hook_float32_Calib;
-         break;
-      case SWIT_UINT8:
-         *((uint8 *)value)=SWIT_Sfty_Output_hook_uint8_Calib;
-         break;
-      case SWIT_UINT16:
-         *((uint16 *)value)=SWIT_Sfty_Output_hook_uint16_Calib;
-         break;
-      case SWIT_UINT32:
-         *((uint32 *)value)=SWIT_Sfty_Output_hook_uint32_Calib;
-         break;
-      default:
-         break;
-   }
-}
-}
-static inline void SWIT_Sfty_Check_Output(void *value,uint16 key,uint8 type)
-{
-\tif((SWIT_DCHA_MAIN_KEY_ENABLE==SWIT_Dcha_Main_Key)&&(key==SWIT_KEY_output)){
-      switch(type){
-         case SWIT_FLOAT32:
-            SWIT_Sfty_Output_hook_float32=*((float32 *)value);
-            break;
-         case SWIT_UINT8:
-            SWIT_Sfty_Output_hook_uint8=*((uint8 *)value);
-            break;
-         case SWIT_UINT16:
-            SWIT_Sfty_Output_hook_uint16=*((uint16 *)value);
-            break;
-         case SWIT_UINT32:
-            SWIT_Sfty_Output_hook_uint32=*((uint32 *)value);
-            break;
-         default:
-            break;
-      }
-   }
-}

-{

-   /* ************* Source code **************** */

-   for (instance = 0U; instance < spiArrayCount; instance++)
-   {
-      if (ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiBasePtrs[instance] == spi)
-      {
-         break;
-      }
-      else
-      {
-         /* Do nothing */
-      }
-   }
-   return instance;
-}

-   /* ************* Source code **************** */

-      for(wrIdx = 0U; wrIdx < SPIDRVR_TRIPLEBUF_DEPTH; wrIdx++)

-                  && (wrIdx != ActvDchaSpiDrvrTripleBufs[bufId].latestDataIdx))

-         {
-             /* Do nothing */

-         ActvDchaSpiDrvrTripleBufs[bufId].tripleBuf[ActvDchaSpiDrvrTripleBufs[bufId].wrLockIdx][dataIdx] = data;

-   }
-
-   return;

-      else

-      }
-   }

-   return;

-   }
-   else
-   {
-      retData = 0xFFU;
-   }

-   return retData;

-#endif
-   return;

-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      ActvDchaSpiDrvr_Init
- * \\brief   Initialize SPI Slave Driver
- * \\param [in] spi a pointer to an SPI_Type
- * \\param [in] cfg a pointer to the SPI driver\'s configuration
- * \\return status of function \'ActvDchaSpiDrvr_Init\' E_OK/E_NOT_OK.
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-Std_Return_Type ActvDchaSpiDrvr_Init(void)
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   uint8 spiInstC1Reg    = 0U;
-   uint32 spiInstanceIdx = 0UL;
-
-
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-   spiInstanceIdx = ActvDchaSpiDrvr_GetInstance(ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule);
-
-   /* Ungate the SPIx clock */
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-   /* PRQA S 0306 3 */
-   /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-    * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-   SIM_BASE_PTR->SCGC |= ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiSimMasks[spiInstanceIdx];
-
-   /* Enable SPIx Interrupt in NVIC */
-   NvicEnIrq(ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiIrqNumbers[spiInstanceIdx], 0UL);
-
-   spiInstC1Reg |= SPI_C1_SPIE_MASK; /* SPI Interrupt Enable: for SPRF and MODF */
-   spiInstC1Reg |= SPI_C1_SPE_MASK; /* SPI System Enable */
-
-   /* Configure Clock Phase */
-   spiInstC1Reg |= (uint8) ((uint8) ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiCfg.ClkPhase << SPI_C1_CPHA_SHIFT);
-   /* Configure Clock Polarity */
-   spiInstC1Reg |= (uint8) ((uint8) ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiCfg.ClkPolarity << SPI_C1_CPOL_SHIFT);
-   /* Configure Shift Direction */
-   spiInstC1Reg |= (uint8) ((uint8) ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiCfg.ShiftDir << SPI_C1_LSBFE_SHIFT);
-
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->C1 = spiInstC1Reg;
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->C2 = 0x0U;
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->BR = 0x0U;
-
-   /* Initialize SPI Drivers Parameters */
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrTrcvSt = TRCV_IDLE;
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvr_IsAfFrame = FALSE;
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr = 0U;
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrFrmTimeoutErrCtr = 0UL;
-
-   #ifdef SPI_TIMEOUT_EN
-   ActvDchaSysTick_SetTmrPerd(ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiCfg.SpiDrvrTimeoutCmrCf.TmrCh,
-                              ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiCfg.SpiDrvrTimeoutCmrCf.TmrPerd,
-                              ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiCfg.SpiDrvrTimeoutCmrCf.TmrPerdUnit);
-   ActvDchaSysTick_EnIntrpt(ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiCfg.SpiDrvrTimeoutCmrCf.TmrCh);
-   #endif
-
-   /* Initialize SPI transmit buffer */
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrRegReadDummy = ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->S;
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->D = 0x0U;
-   __NOP();__NOP();__NOP();__NOP();__NOP();  /* Wait to make sure tx reg is writable again */
-   __NOP();__NOP();__NOP();__NOP();__NOP();
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrRegReadDummy = ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->S;
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->D = 0x0U;
-   return E_OK;
-}

-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      SPI1_IRQHandler
- * \\brief   SPI1 Interrupt service routine
- * \\param void
- * \\return void
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-/*! \\misra Warning No C2004:8.8 "An external object or function shall be declared in one and only one file." */
-/* PRQA S 3408 1 *//* This function is a interrupt handler so no previous declaration is needed*/
-void SPI1_IRQHandler(void)
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   register uint8 rxByte = 0U;
-   register uint8 statusReg = ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->S;   /* Read status register */
-
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-
-   if ((statusReg & SPI_S_SPRF_MASK) > 0U) /* Check Buffer Full Flag */
-   {
-      /* Receive next byte */
-      rxByte = ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->D;
-
-      switch (ActvDchaSpiDrvrTrcvSt) {
-         case TRCV_IDLE:
-            #ifdef SPI_TIMEOUT_EN
-               /* Start frame timeout timer */
-               /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-               /* PRQA S 0306 3 */
-               /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-                * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-               PIT->CHANNEL[ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiCfg.SpiDrvrTimeoutCmrCf.TmrCh].TCTRL |= PIT_TCTRL_TEN_MASK;
-            #endif
-
-            ActvDchaSpiDrvrTrcvSt = TRCV_SKIP;
-
-            if(rxByte == ACTVDCHASPIPROT_AF_ID)
-            {
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtrTop = (uint8) ACTVDCHASPIDRVR_APPL_PKG_SIZE;
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvr_IsAfFrame = TRUE;
-
-               /* Transmit next byte */
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->D = ActvDchaSpiDrvr_RdByteTripleBuf(SPIDRVR_TX_TRIPLEBUF_ID,
-                                                                             ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr);
-               /* Store received byte */
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvr_WrByteTripleBuf(SPIDRVR_RX_TRIPLEBUF_ID, rxByte, ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr);
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvrTrcvSt = TRCV_ACTV;
-            }
-            else if(rxByte == ACTVDCHASPIPROT_BF_ID)
-            {
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtrTop = (uint8) ACTVDCHASPIDRVR_BOOT_LD_SIZE;
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvr_IsAfFrame = FALSE;
-
-               /* Transmit next byte */
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->D = 0U;
-               /* Store received byte */
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvr_WrByteTripleBuf(SPIDRVR_RX_TRIPLEBUF_ID, rxByte, ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr);
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvrTrcvSt = TRCV_ACTV;
-            }
-            else
-            {
-               /* Handle wrong byte */
-            }
-
-            if(ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr < UINT8_MAX_VAL)
-            {
-            \tActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr++;
-            }
-            else
-            {
-               /* Do Nothing */
-            }
-            break;
-         case TRCV_ACTV:
-            /* Transmit next byte */
-            if(ActvDchaSpiDrvr_IsAfFrame == TRUE)
-            {
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->D = ActvDchaSpiDrvr_RdByteTripleBuf(SPIDRVR_TX_TRIPLEBUF_ID,
-                                                                             ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr);
-            }
-            else
-            {
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->D = 0U;
-            }
-
-            /* Store received byte */
-            ActvDchaSpiDrvr_WrByteTripleBuf(SPIDRVR_RX_TRIPLEBUF_ID, rxByte, ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr);
-
-            if(ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr < UINT8_MAX_VAL)
-            {
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr++;
-            }
-            else
-            {
-               /* Do Nothing */
-            }
-            /* Check if all bytes of package have been received */
-            if (ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr >= ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtrTop)
-            {
-               #ifdef SPI_TIMEOUT_EN
-                  /* Stop frame timeout timer */
-                  /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-                  /* PRQA S 0306 3 */
-                  /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-                   * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-                  PIT->CHANNEL[ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiCfg.SpiDrvrTimeoutCmrCf.TmrCh].TCTRL &= ~(uint32)PIT_TCTRL_TEN_MASK;
-               #endif
-
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvrRxByteCtr = 0U;
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvrTrcvSt = TRCV_IDLE;
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvr_IsAfFrame = FALSE;
-
-               /* Free triple buffer locks */
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvr_FreeRdLockTripleBuf(SPIDRVR_TX_TRIPLEBUF_ID);
-               ActvDchaSpiDrvr_FreeWrLockTripleBuf(SPIDRVR_RX_TRIPLEBUF_ID);
-            }
-            break;
-         case TRCV_SKIP:
-            ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->D = 0U;
-            break;
-         default:
-            ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->D = 0U;
-            break;
-      }
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /* Do nothing */
-   }
-   return;
-}
-
-/*! \\misra Warning No C2004:8.8 "An external object or function shall be declared in one and only one file." */
-/* PRQA S 3408 1 *//* This function is a interrupt handler so no previous declaration is needed*/
-void PIT_CH1_IRQHandler(void)
-{
-
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-   /* PRQA S 0306 7 */
-   /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-    * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-
-   /* Clear interrupt flag */
-   PIT->CHANNEL[ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiCfg.SpiDrvrTimeoutCmrCf.TmrCh].TFLG |= ((uint32)1U << PIT_TFLG_TIF_SHIFT);
-   /* Stop frame timeout timer */
-   PIT->CHANNEL[ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiCfg.SpiDrvrTimeoutCmrCf.TmrCh].TCTRL &= ~(uint32)PIT_TCTRL_TEN_MASK;

-   __disable_irq();
-

-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrTrcvSt = TRCV_IDLE;
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvr_IsAfFrame = FALSE;

-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->D = 0x0U;
-   __NOP();__NOP();__NOP();__NOP();__NOP();  /* Wait to make sure tx reg is writable again */

-   ActvDchaSpiDrvrSpiModule->D = 0x0U;
-

-   /* ========== CRITICAL SECTION END =========== */
-   if(ActvDchaSpiDrvrFrmTimeoutErrCtr < UINT32_MAX_VAL)
-   {
-      ActvDchaSpiDrvrFrmTimeoutErrCtr++;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /* Do Nothing */
-   }
-   return;

-    ACTVDCHA_PRMID_ENCRYPTED_DATA1_32BIT_LSB    = 0U    /*!< Byte 0 to Byte 3 of the encrypted message from Aurix */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_ENCRYPTED_DATA2_32BIT        = 1U    /*!< Byte 4 to Byte 7 of the encrypted message from Aurix */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_ENCRYPTED_DATA3_32BIT        = 2U    /*!< Byte 8 to Byte 11 of the encrypted message from Aurix */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_ENCRYPTED_DATA4_32BIT_MSB    = 3U    /*!< Byte 12 to Byte 15 of the encrypted message from Aurix */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HVVOLTGAIN                   = 4U    /*!< ADC Handler HV Voltage Gain */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HVVOLTOFFS                   = 5U    /*!< ADC Handler HV Voltage Offset */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HVCURRGAIN                   = 6U    /*!< ADC Handler HV Current Gain */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HVCURROFFS                   = 7U    /*!< ADC Handler HV Current Offset */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_LOWUTHD                      = 8U    /*!< ActvDcha Handler Low Voltage Threshold */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HYSUTHD                      = 9U    /*!< ActvDcha Handler Hysteresis Voltage Threshold */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HWTRIGDLY                    = 10U    /*!< ActvDcha Handler HW Trigger Delay */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_DCHAPWRMAX                   = 11U    /*!< ActvDcha Handler Maximum Discharge Power */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_TOPVALENTMR                  = 12U    /*!< ActvDcha Handler Top Value Enable Timer [sec]*/
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_TOPVALSYSPROTECTIONTMR       = 13U    /*!< ActvDcha Handler Top Value System Protection Timer [sec]*/
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_TOPVALSPIPRMTIMEOUTTMR       = 14U    /*!< ActvDcha Handler Top Value SPI parameter timer [msec]*/
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_SPITIMEOUTPERD               = 15U    /*!< SPI Driver Timeout Period */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_ACTVDCHA_DSBLD_OC_THD        = 16U    /*!< ActvDcha Handler Confirm time for current diagnose error when Active discharge is Active */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_ACTVDCHA_ENAD_OC_THD         = 17U    /*!< ActvDcha Handler Over current threshold when Active discharge is Active */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_ACTVDCHA_ENAD_UC_THD         = 18U    /*!< ActvDcha Handler Over current threshold when Active discharge is Active */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_MAX_RETRY_COUNT                    = 19U    /*!< Maximum number of retries on failure of active discharge.*/
-   ,ACTVDCHA_ALVCNTR_ERR_SIMN_EN                = 20U    /*!< Enable alive counter error for testing purpose */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_CRC_ERR_SIMN_EN                    = 21U    /*!< Enable CRC error for testing purpose */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_BOARD_TEST_EN                      = 22U    /*!< Enable PWM testing during board testing */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_BOARD_TEST_PWM_DUTYCYC             = 23U    /*!< PWM duty cycle value when board test is enabled. */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_P15_VOLOFFS                  = 24U    /*!< 15V Power supply offset. */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_P15_VOLGAIN                  = 25U    /*!< 15V Power supply gain. */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_P15_LOWRUTHD                 = 26U    /*!< 15V Power supply lower threshold. */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_P15_UPPRUTHD                 = 27U    /*!< 15V Power supply upper threshold. */
-   ,ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HV_CUR_FILT_FAC              = 28U
-}ActvDchaSpiHndlr_PrmIdType;

-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      void ActvDchaSpiHndlr_ReadMsg(ActvDchaSpiRxMsg_Type* RxMessage)
- * \\brief   Return received message if CRC check successful
- * \\param [in] RxMessage: pointer to RxMessage variable
- * \\return Std_ReturnType E_OK if CRC check successful otherwise E_NOT_OK
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-static inline Std_Return_Type ActvDchaSpiHndlr_CheckAfMsg(const uint8 data[])
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   Std_Return_Type ret = E_NOT_OK;
-
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-
-#ifdef CRC_RX_EN
-   if (ActvDchaCrc_CalcCrc32(data, RXPKG_CRC_IDX) != ActvDchaSpiHndlr_GetCrc32(data, RXPKG_CRC_IDX))
-   {
-      /* Limit error count to maximum value */
-      if(ActvDchaSpiHndlrCrcErrCtr < UINT32_MAX_VAL)
-      {
-         /* CRC check failed */
-         ActvDchaSpiHndlrCrcErrCtr++;
-      }
-      else
-      {
-         /* Do nothing */
-      }
-      ret = E_NOT_OK;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-#endif
-#ifdef ALVCTR_RX_EN
-      /* CRC check successful */
-      if(1U == ActvDchaSpiHndlrFirstRunFlg)
-      {
-         ActvDchaSpiHndlrFirstRunFlg = 0U;
-         ret = E_OK;
-      }
-      else
-      {
-         if (data[RXPKG_ALV_IDX] == (uint8)(ActvDchaSpiHndlrRxAlive + 1U))
-         {
-            /* Alv check successful */
-            ret = E_OK;
-         }
-         else
-         {
-            /* Limit error count to maximum value */
-            if(ActvDchaSpiHndlrAlvErrCtr < UINT32_MAX_VAL)
-            {
-               /* Alv check failed */
-               ActvDchaSpiHndlrAlvErrCtr++;
-            }
-            else
-            {
-               /* Do nothing */
-            }
-            ret = E_NOT_OK;
-         }
-      }
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrRxAlive = data[RXPKG_ALV_IDX];
-#else
-      ret = E_OK;
-#endif
-#ifdef CRC_RX_EN
-   }
-#endif
-
-   return ret;
-}
-
-static inline void ActvDchaSpiHndlr_ProcAfMsg(const uint8 data[])
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   uint8  spiInhibit = 0x0U;
-
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-
-   if (E_OK == ActvDchaSpiHndlr_CheckAfMsg(data))  /* Process new application frame */
-   {
-      /* Limit error count to maximum value */
-      if(ActvDchaSpiHndlrMsgOkCtr < UINT32_MAX_VAL)
-      {
-         /* CRC check failed */
-         ActvDchaSpiHndlrMsgOkCtr++;
-      }
-      else
-      {
-           /* Do nothing */
-      }
-
-      #ifdef BOOTLOADER_JMP_EN
-      if ((data[RXPKG_GP0_IDX] & RXPKG_GP0BOOTRQ_MASK) > 0U)
-      {
-         /* Set reason to 1, this can be polled by Bootloader to check if it was a Application\'s request to jump */
-         ActvDchaSpiHndlrResetReason = ACTVDCHASPIHNDLR_BOOTLOADER_JUMP_PATTERN;
-         NVIC_SystemReset();  /* Doing a system restart will jump to Booloader */
-      }
-      #endif
-
-      #ifdef RESET_JMP_EN
-      if ((data[RXPKG_GP0_IDX] & RXPKG_GP0RSTRQ_MASK) > 0U)
-      {
-         ActvDchaSpiHndlrResetReason = 0U;                  /* Set reason to 0 */
-         NVIC_SystemReset();
-      }
-      #endif
-
-      #ifdef GPIO_OUTP_EN
-      /* Set GPIO pins */
-      ActvDchaPortHndlr_SetOutpPins(data[RXPKG_GPIOCFG_IDX]);
-      #endif
-
-      #ifdef PRM_UPD_EN
-      /* Update Parameters */
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlr_UpdPrm(data, RXPKG_PRM0_H_IDX);
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlr_UpdPrm(data, RXPKG_PRM1_H_IDX);
-      #endif
-
-      spiInhibit = (uint8) ((data[RXPKG_GP0_IDX] & RXPKG_GP0ACTVDCHAINHIBIT_MASK) >> RXPKG_GP0ACTVDCHAINHIBIT_SHIFT);
-      ActvDchaHndlr_UpdSpiPrms(spiInhibit);
-   }
-
-   return;
-}
-
-static inline Std_Return_Type ActvDchaSpiHndlr_CheckBlMsg(const uint8 data[8])
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   uint8 idx = 0x0U;
-   Std_Return_Type ret = E_OK;
-
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-   for (idx = 0U; idx < 8U; ++idx)
-   {
-      if(data[idx] != ActvDchaSpiHndlrBlFrameData[idx])
-      {
-         ret = E_NOT_OK;
-      }
-   }
-   return ret;
-}
-
-static inline void ActvDchaSpiHndlr_ProcBlMsg(const uint8 data[])
-{
-   if(E_OK == ActvDchaSpiHndlr_CheckBlMsg(data))
-   {
-      /* Limit error count to maximum value */
-      if(ActvDchaSpiHndlrMsgOkCtr < UINT32_MAX_VAL)
-      {
-         /* CRC check failed */
-         ActvDchaSpiHndlrMsgOkCtr++;
-      }
-      else
-      {
-           /* Do nothing */
-      }
-#ifdef BOOTLOADER_JMP_EN
-      /* Set reason to 1, this can be polled by Bootloader to check if it was a Application\'s request to jump */
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrResetReason = ACTVDCHASPIHNDLR_BOOTLOADER_JUMP_PATTERN;
-      NVIC_SystemReset();  /* Doing a system restart will jump to Booloader */
-#endif
-   }
-
-   return;
-}
-
-static inline void ActvDchaSpiHndlr_BuildTxMsg(void)
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   uint32 crc32 = 0U;
-   uint8 msgBuf[ACTVDCHASPIDRVR_APPL_PKG_SIZE] = {0U};
-   uint16 AlvCntrErrSmlnEnSts = 0U;
-   uint16 CrcErrSmlnEnSts = 0U;
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-
-   /* Add serialized ADC values to message */
-
-   /*
-    * Pack 12bit ADC values into 8 bit frames:
-    *
-    * |        ADC0[11:4]       |
-    * | ADC0[3:0]  | ADC1[11:8] |
-    * |        ADC1[7:0]        |
-    *             ...
-    *
-    */
-   AlvCntrErrSmlnEnSts = ActvDchaHndlr_GetActvDchaAlvCntrSmlnStatus();
-   CrcErrSmlnEnSts = ActvDchaHndlr_GetCRCErrSmlnStatus();
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_ADCPART0_IDX] = (uint8) (ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.HvVoltVal >> NIBBLE_SHIFT);
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_ADCPART1_IDX] = ((uint8)0xF0 & (uint8) (ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.HvVoltVal  << NIBBLE_SHIFT)) |
-                                ((uint8)0x0F & (uint8) (ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.IgbtTempU  >> BYTE_SHIFT));
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_ADCPART2_IDX] = (uint8) (ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.IgbtTempU);
-
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_ADCPART3_IDX] = (uint8) (ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.IgbtTempV >> NIBBLE_SHIFT);
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_ADCPART4_IDX] = ((uint8)0xF0 & (uint8) (ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.IgbtTempV  << NIBBLE_SHIFT)) |
-                                ((uint8)0x0F & (uint8) (ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.IgbtTempW  >> BYTE_SHIFT));
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_ADCPART5_IDX] = (uint8) (ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.IgbtTempW);
-
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlr_UpdMeasVal(msgBuf, TXPKG_DATA0_IDX);
-
-   /* Add status byte to message */
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_STS_IDX] = ActvDchaSpiHndlrStatus;
-
-   /* Add alive counter to message.
-    * If alive counter error simulation is enabled, run alive counter backward,
-    * else increment the alive counter */
-   if(ENABLE == AlvCntrErrSmlnEnSts)
-   {
-      /* Simulate stuck main loop. ADIS will send message with same alive counter */
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrTxAlive++;
-   }
-
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_ALV_IDX] = ActvDchaSpiHndlrTxAlive;
-
-   /* Add CRC to message.
-    * If CRC error simulation is enabled, update CRC to 0,
-    * else use the calculated value. */
-   if(ENABLE == CrcErrSmlnEnSts)
-   {
-      crc32 = 0U;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      crc32 = ActvDchaCrc_CalcCrc32(msgBuf, (uint32) TXPKG_CRC_IDX);
-   }
-
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_CRC_IDX + TXPKG_CRC_HU_OFF] = 0xFFU & (uint8) (crc32 >> 24UL);
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_CRC_IDX + TXPKG_CRC_HL_OFF] = 0xFFU & (uint8) (crc32 >> 16UL);
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_CRC_IDX + TXPKG_CRC_LU_OFF] = 0xFFU & (uint8) (crc32 >> 8UL);
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_CRC_IDX + TXPKG_CRC_LL_OFF] = 0xFFU & (uint8) (crc32);
-
-   /* Add two dummy bytes to compensate buffer of SPI module */
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_DUMMY0_IDX] = 0x0U;
-   msgBuf[TXPKG_DUMMY1_IDX] = 0x0U;
-
-#ifdef SWIT_Active
-    SWIT_ActvDchaSpiHndlr_BuildTxMsg_Endhook(msgBuf);
-#endif
-
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvr_WrTxMsg(msgBuf, ACTVDCHASPIDRVR_APPL_PKG_SIZE);
-}
-
-static inline uint32 ActvDchaSpiHndlr_GetCrc32(const uint8 data[], uint32 offset)
-{
-   return (uint32) (((uint32) data[offset + RXPKG_CRC_HU_OFF] << 24U) |
-                    ((uint32) data[offset + RXPKG_CRC_HL_OFF] << 16U) |
-                    ((uint32) data[offset + RXPKG_CRC_LU_OFF] << 8U) |
-                    ((uint32) data[offset + RXPKG_CRC_LL_OFF]));
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      void ActvDchaSpiHndlr_UpdPrm(uint8 data[], uint32 offset)
- * \\brief   Function to update parameters
- * \\param [in] uint8 data[] buffer with SPI package
- * \\param [in] uint32 offset index to start extracting param id and value from
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-static inline void ActvDchaSpiHndlr_UpdPrm(const uint8 data[], uint32 offset)
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlr_PrmIdType prmId     = (ActvDchaSpiHndlr_PrmIdType)0x0U;
-   uint32 prmVal    = 0x0UL;
-
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:10.3 "The value of a complex expression of integer type shall only be cast to a type of the same signedness that is no wider than the underlying type of the expression." */
-   /* PRQA S 4394 2 */
-   /* This cast is used to interpret the received data as defined in the bus protocol*/
-   prmId  = (ActvDchaSpiHndlr_PrmIdType)(((uint32) data[offset + RXPKG_PRMID_H_OFF]   << 8UL ) | ((uint32) data[offset + RXPKG_PRMID_L_OFF]));
-
-   prmVal = (uint32) (((uint32) data[offset + RXPKG_PRMVAL_HU_OFF] << 24UL) | ((uint32) data[offset + RXPKG_PRMVAL_HL_OFF] << 16UL) |
-            ((uint32) data[offset + RXPKG_PRMVAL_LU_OFF] << 8UL ) | ((uint32) data[offset + RXPKG_PRMVAL_LL_OFF]));
-#ifdef SWIT_Active
-   SWIT_ActvDchaSpiHndlr_UpdPrm_Bgnhook(prmId,&prmVal);
-#endif
-   switch (prmId)
-   {
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HVVOLTGAIN:
-      {
-         ActvDchaAdcHndlr_UpdHvUGain(prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HVVOLTOFFS:
-      {
-         ActvDchaAdcHndlr_UpdHvUOffs((int32) prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HVCURRGAIN:
-      {
-         ActvDchaAdcHndlr_UpdHvIGain(prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HVCURROFFS:
-      {
-         ActvDchaAdcHndlr_UpdHvIOffs((int32) prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_LOWUTHD:
-      {
-         ActvDchaHndlr_UpdDchaLowUThd(prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HYSUTHD:
-      {
-         ActvDchaHndlr_UpdDchaHysUThd(prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_HWTRIGDLY:
-      {
-         ActvDchaHndlr_UpdHwTrigDly(prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_DCHAPWRMAX:
-      {
-         ActvDchaHndlr_UpdDchaPwrMax(prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_TOPVALENTMR:
-      {
-         ActvDchaHndlr_UpdTopVal_DchaEnTmr((uint16) prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_TOPVALSYSPROTECTIONTMR:
-      {
-         ActvDchaHndlr_UpdTopVal_DchaSysProtectionTmr((uint16) prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_TOPVALSPIPRMTIMEOUTTMR:
-      {
-         ActvDchaHndlr_UpdTopVal_DchaSpiPrmTimeoutTmr((uint16) prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_SPITIMEOUTPERD:
-      {
-         ActvDchaSpiDrvr_UpdTimeoutPerd(prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_ACTVDCHA_DSBLD_OC_THD:
-      {
-         ActvDchaHndlr_UpdDchaInActOvrCurrThd((uint16)prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_ACTVDCHA_ENAD_OC_THD:
-      {
-         ActvDchaHndlr_UpdDchaActOvrCurrThd((uint16)prmVal);
-         break;
-      }
-
-      case ACTVDCHA_PRMID_ACTVDCHA_ENAD_UC_THD:
-      {

-         break;
-      }

-         ActvDchaSpiHndlrSecuMsg[13] = data[offset + RXPKG_PRMVAL_LU_OFF];

-         break;

-      }

-      default:
-      {
-         /* Do nothing */
-         break;
-      }
-   }

-         measVal = _sw_id;
-         break;
-      }
-   }
-

-
-   data[offset + TXPKG_DATAVAL_HU_OFF] =  (uint8) (0xFFU & (measVal >> SHIFT_BY_24));

-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      ActvDchaSpiHndlr_Init
- * \\brief   This function does the SPI Handler Initialization
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-Std_Return_Type ActvDchaSpiHndlr_Init(void)
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   Std_Return_Type ret = E_NOT_OK;
-
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-
-   if (E_NOT_OK == ActvDchaSpiDrvr_Init())
-   {
-      ret = E_NOT_OK;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrFirstRunFlg = 1U;
-
-      /* Initialize status byte */
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrStatus = 0U;
-
-      /* Initialize alive counter */
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrTxAlive = 0U;
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrRxAlive = 0U;
-
-      /* Initialize reset Reason */
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrResetReason = 0u;
-
-      /* Initialize error counter */
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrCrcErrCtr = 0UL;
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrAlvErrCtr = 0UL;
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrMsgRxCtr  = 0UL;
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrMsgOkCtr  = 0UL;
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrDataId    = ACTVDCHA_MEASID_SW_VERSION;
-      ret = E_OK;
-   }
-
-   return ret;
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      ActvDchaSpiHndlr_MainFunction
- * \\brief   Main function of ADC Handler is called in main cyclically to forward
- *          the calculated HV current and voltage values to ActvDchaHndlr and to
- *          forward the ADC values to ActvDchaSpiHndlr
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-void ActvDchaSpiHndlr_MainFunction(void)
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   uint8 readInpSts = 0U;
-   uint8 rxMessage[ACTVDCHASPIDRVR_APPL_PKG_SIZE] = {0U};
-
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-
-   ActvDchaSpiDrvr_RdRxMsg(rxMessage);
-   /* Limit error count to maximum value */
-   if(ActvDchaSpiHndlrMsgRxCtr < UINT32_MAX_VAL)
-   {
-      /* CRC check failed */
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlrMsgRxCtr++;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-        /* Do nothing */
-   }
-   if(ACTVDCHASPIPROT_AF_ID == rxMessage[RXPKG_PKGID_IDX])
-   {
-      /* Process application frame */
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlr_ProcAfMsg(rxMessage);
-   }
-   else if(ACTVDCHASPIPROT_BF_ID == rxMessage[RXPKG_PKGID_IDX])
-   {
-      /* Process bootloader frame */
-      ActvDchaSpiHndlr_ProcBlMsg(rxMessage);
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /* Ignore invalid message */
-   }
-
-#ifdef GPIO_INP_EN
-   /* Read GPIO pins */
-   readInpSts = ActvDchaPortHndlr_ReadInpPins();
-   /* Clear last PGIO input status.
-    * bit0 of status byte holds the value of input GPIO state. */
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlrStatus = (uint8) (ActvDchaSpiHndlrStatus & (uint8)(~ACTVDCHASPIHNDLR_READ_INP_STS_MASK));
-   /* Write new GPIO input status */
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlrStatus = (uint8) (ActvDchaSpiHndlrStatus | (readInpSts & ACTVDCHASPIHNDLR_READ_INP_STS_MASK));
-#endif
-
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlr_BuildTxMsg();
-
-   return;
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      ActvDchaSpiHndlr_UpdAdcPrms
- * \\brief   This function will forward the ADC Raw values obtained from
- *          ADC Handler to SPI Protocol Layer
- * \\param [in] ActvDchaAdcDrvr_DatBufType* rawAdcVals
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-void ActvDchaSpiHndlr_UpdAdcPrms(const ActvDchaAdcHndlr_DatBufType* rawAdcVals)

-   ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.IgbtTempV = rawAdcVals->IgbtTempV;
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.IgbtTempW = rawAdcVals->IgbtTempW;
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.HvCurrentVal = rawAdcVals->HvCurrentVal;
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.CurrentVal_2 = rawAdcVals->CurrentVal_2;
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.HvMonMeas = rawAdcVals->HvMonMeas;
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.P15DrvVal = rawAdcVals->P15DrvVal;
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.P2V5UcHv = rawAdcVals->P2V5UcHv;
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.PcbVariant = rawAdcVals->PcbVariant;
-   ActvDchaSpiHndlrAdcVals.PcbVersion = rawAdcVals->PcbVersion;
-   return;
-}

-static const IRQn_Type  ActvDchaSysTickPitIrqNumbers[]  = { PIT_CH0_IRQn, PIT_CH1_IRQn };
-
-/*================== [prototype of local functions] =========================*/
-static uint32 ActvDchaSysTick_UsecToCount(uint32 us, uint32 clockFreq);
-static uint32 ActvDchaSysTick_CountToUsec(uint32 count, uint32 clockFreq);
-
-static uint32 ActvDchaSysTick_MsecToCount(uint32 ms, uint32 clockFreq);
-static uint32 ActvDchaSysTick_CountToMsec(uint32 count, uint32 clockFreq);
-
-/*================== [definition of local functions] ========================*/
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn ActvDchaSysTick_UsecToCount
- * \\brief Helper function to convert a duration in microseconds
- *        to count value to be stored in register.
- * @param [in] us - Duration to convert in [us]
- * @param [in] clockFreqInHz - Frequency of the clock in [Hz]
- * @return - Count value.
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-static uint32 ActvDchaSysTick_UsecToCount(uint32 us, uint32 clockFreq)
-{
-   uint64 result;
-   /* Calculate the count value from microsecond*/
-   result = (uint64)(((uint64)us * clockFreq) / 1000000UL);
-   /* If calculated value is more than UINT32_MAX_VAL, limit it to UINT32_MAX_VAL. */
-   if( UINT32_MAX_VAL < result)
-   {
-      result = (uint64)UINT32_MAX_VAL;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /* Do Nothing*/
-   }
-   return (uint32)result;
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn ActvDchaSysTick_CountToUsec
- * \\brief Helper function to convert a duration in clock cycles
- *        to microseconds
- * @param [in] count - Number of clock cycles
- * @param [in] clockFreqInHz - Frequency of the clock in [Hz]
- * @return - Duration in microsecond.
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-static uint32 ActvDchaSysTick_CountToUsec(uint32 count, uint32 clockFreq)
-{
-   uint64 result;
-   /* Division by 0 protection */
-   if(0UL != clockFreq)
-   {
-      result = (uint64)(((uint64)count * 1000000UL) / clockFreq);
-   /* If calculated value is more than UINT32_MAX_VAL, limit it to UINT32_MAX_VAL. */
-      if( UINT32_MAX_VAL < result)
-      {
-         result = (uint64)UINT32_MAX_VAL;
-      }
-      else
-      {
-         /* Do Nothing*/
-      }
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      result = 0U;
-   }
-   return (uint32)result;
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn ActvDchaSysTick_MsecToCount
- * \\brief Helper function to convert a duration in milliseconds
- *        to clock cycles(count)
- * @param [in] ms - Duration to convert in [ms]
- * @param [in] clockFreqInHz - Frequency of the clock in [Hz]
- * @return - Count value.
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-static uint32 ActvDchaSysTick_MsecToCount(uint32 ms, uint32 clockFreq)
-{
-   uint64 result;
-
-   result = (uint64)(((uint64)ms * clockFreq) / 1000UL);
-   /* If calculated value is more than UINT32_MAX_VAL, limit it to UINT32_MAX_VAL. */
-   if( UINT32_MAX_VAL < result)
-   {
-      result = (uint64)UINT32_MAX_VAL;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /* Do Nothing*/
-   }
-   return (uint32)result;
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn ActvDchaSysTick_CountToMsec
- * \\brief Helper function to convert a duration in clock cycles
- *        to milliseconds
- * @param [in] count - Number of clock cycles
- * @param [in] clockFreqInHz - Frequency of the clock in [Hz]
- * @return - Duration in ms
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-static uint32 ActvDchaSysTick_CountToMsec(uint32 count, uint32 clockFreq)
-{
-   uint64 result;
-   /* Division by 0 protection */
-   if(0U != clockFreq)
-   {
-      result = (uint64)(((uint64)count * 1000UL) / clockFreq);
-      /* If calculated value is more than UINT32_MAX_VAL, limit it to UINT32_MAX_VAL. */
-      if( UINT32_MAX_VAL < result)
-      {
-         result = (uint64)UINT32_MAX_VAL;
-      }
-      else
-      {
-         /* Do Nothing*/
-      }
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      result = 0U;
-   }
-   return (uint32)result;
-}
-
-/*================== [definition of global functions] =======================*/
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      ActvDchaSysTick_Init
- * \\brief   Init function for PIT System Ticks
- * @param - Nil
- * @return - E_OK
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-Std_Return_Type ActvDchaSysTick_Init(void)
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   uint32 reg = 0UL;
-
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-   /* PRQA S 0306 20 */
-   /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-    * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-
-   /* Ungate the PIT clock*/
-   SIM_BASE_PTR->SCGC |= SIM_SCGC_PIT_MASK;
-
-   /* Enable PIT timers */
-   reg = PIT->MCR;   /* Inserted read of MCR to prevent Errata e7914 */
-
-   reg &= ~(uint32)PIT_MCR_MDIS_MASK;
-   if (TRUE == ActvDchaSysTickCfg.EnRunInDebug)
-   {
-      reg &= ~(uint32)PIT_MCR_FRZ_MASK;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      reg |= PIT_MCR_FRZ_MASK;
-   }
-
-   PIT->MCR = reg;
-
-   /* Enable SysTick counter for CPU load measurement and
-    * set "Processor Clock" as clock source.
-    * Load-Register is set to maximum (24bit) value.
-    */
-   SysTick->LOAD = 0x00FFFFFFU;/* PRQA S 0306 */
-   SysTick->VAL = 0x00FFFFFFU;/* A write of any value clears the field to 0, and also clears the SYST_CSR.COUNTFLAG bit to 0. *//* PRQA S 0306 */
-   SysTick->CTRL |= SysTick_CTRL_ENABLE_Msk | SysTick_CTRL_CLKSOURCE_Msk;/* PRQA S 0306 */
-
-   return E_OK;
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn ActvDchaSysTick_SetTmrPerd
- * \\brief This function sets the register value based on the time period and unit.
- * @param [in] ch - PIT channel number
- * @param [in] perd - Time duration to be set
- * @param [in] perdUnit - Time duration unit(ms/us)
- * @return - void
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-void ActvDchaSysTick_SetTmrPerd(ActvDchaSysTick_TmrChType ch, uint32 perd, ActvDchaSysTick_TmrUnitType perdUnit)
-{
-   /* Check if the input channel number is less than the maximum number of channels */
-   if(ch < TimerChMaxNr)
-   {
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-   /* PRQA S 0306 10 */
-   /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-    * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */   
-      if (MSEC == perdUnit)
-      {
-         PIT->CHANNEL[ch].LDVAL = ActvDchaSysTick_MsecToCount(perd, ActvDchaSysTickCfg.TimerClk_Hz);
-      }
-      else if (USEC == perdUnit)
-      {
-         PIT->CHANNEL[ch].LDVAL = ActvDchaSysTick_UsecToCount(perd, ActvDchaSysTickCfg.TimerClk_Hz);
-      }
-      else
-      {
-         /*Do nothing */
-      }
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /* Do nothing */
-   }
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn ActvDchaSysTick_GetTmrPerd
- * \\brief This function gets the configured time duration in specified unit.
- * @param [in] ch - PIT channel number
- * @param [in] perdUnit - Time duration unit(ms/us)
- * @return - void
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-uint32 ActvDchaSysTick_GetTmrPerd(ActvDchaSysTick_TmrChType ch, ActvDchaSysTick_TmrUnitType perdUnit)
-{
-   uint32 retVal = 0UL;
-
-   /* Check if the input channel number is less than the maximum number of channels */
-   if(ch < TimerChMaxNr)
-   { 
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-   /* PRQA S 0306 10 */
-   /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-    * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-      if (MSEC == perdUnit)
-      {
-         retVal = ActvDchaSysTick_CountToMsec(PIT->CHANNEL[ch].LDVAL, ActvDchaSysTickCfg.TimerClk_Hz);
-      }
-      else if (USEC == perdUnit)
-      {
-         retVal = ActvDchaSysTick_CountToUsec(PIT->CHANNEL[ch].LDVAL, ActvDchaSysTickCfg.TimerClk_Hz);
-      }
-      else
-      {
-         /*Do nothing */
-      }
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /* Do nothing */
-   }
-   return retVal;
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn ActvDchaSysTick_SetTmrPerd
- * \\brief This function sets the register value based on the time period and unit and starts the PIT.
- * @param [in] ch - PIT channel number
- * @param [in] perd - Time duration to be set
- * @param [in] perdUnit - Time duration unit(ms/us)
- * @return - void
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-void ActvDchaSysTick_SetStartTmr(ActvDchaSysTick_TmrChType ch, uint32 perd, ActvDchaSysTick_TmrUnitType perdUnit)
-{
-   /* Check if the input channel number is less than the maximum number of channels */
-   if(ch < TimerChMaxNr)
-   {
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-   /* PRQA S 0306 16 */
-   /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-    * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-      if (MSEC == perdUnit)
-      {
-         PIT->CHANNEL[ch].LDVAL =  ActvDchaSysTick_MsecToCount(perd, ActvDchaSysTickCfg.TimerClk_Hz);
-      }
-      else if (USEC == perdUnit)
-      {
-         PIT->CHANNEL[ch].LDVAL =  ActvDchaSysTick_UsecToCount(perd, ActvDchaSysTickCfg.TimerClk_Hz);
-      }
-      else
-      {
-         /*Do nothing */
-      }
-      PIT->CHANNEL[ch].TCTRL |= PIT_TCTRL_TEN_MASK;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /*Do nothing*/
-   }
-   return;
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      ActvDchaSysTick_StartTmr
- * \\brief   Starts the PIT Timer
- * \\param [in] ch - ActvDchaSysTick_TmrChType PIT channel number
- * @return - void
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-void ActvDchaSysTick_StartTmr(ActvDchaSysTick_TmrChType ch)
-{
-   /* Check if the input channel number is less than the maximum number of channels */
-   if(ch < TimerChMaxNr)
-   {
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-   /* PRQA S 0306 3 */
-   /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-    * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-      PIT->CHANNEL[ch].TCTRL |= PIT_TCTRL_TEN_MASK;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /* Do nothing */
-   }
-   return;
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      ActvDchaSysTick_StopTmr
- * \\brief   Stops the PIT Timer
- * \\param [in] ch - ActvDchaSysTick_TmrChType PIT channel number
- * @return - void
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-void ActvDchaSysTick_StopTmr(ActvDchaSysTick_TmrChType ch)
-{
-   /* Check if the input channel number is less than the maximum number of channels */
-   if(ch < TimerChMaxNr)
-   {
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-   /* PRQA S 0306 3 */
-   /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-    * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-      PIT->CHANNEL[ch].TCTRL &= ~(uint32)PIT_TCTRL_TEN_MASK;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /* Do nothing */
-   }
-   return;
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      ActvDchaSysTick_EnIntrpt

- * @return - void

-/******************************************************************/
-void ActvDchaSysTick_EnIntrpt(ActvDchaSysTick_TmrChType ch)
-{

-   if(ch < TimerChMaxNr)
-   {
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */

-   /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-    * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-      PIT->CHANNEL[ch].TCTRL |= PIT_TCTRL_TIE_MASK;
-      NvicEnIrq(ActvDchaSysTickPitIrqNumbers[(uint8) ch], 2U);
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /* Do nothing */
-   }
-   return;

-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      ActvDchaWdgDrvr_IsWdgRst
- * \\brief   This function will check if a watchdog reset happened
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-Boolean_Type ActvDchaWdgDrvr_IsWdgRst(void)
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   uint32 simRstVal = 0UL;
-   Boolean_Type isWdgRst = FALSE;
-
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-   /* PRQA S 0306 3 */
-   /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-    * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-   simRstVal = SIM_SRSID; /* read SIM status register */
-
-   if (((simRstVal & SIM_SRSID_WDOG_MASK) >> SIM_SRSID_WDOG_SHIFT) > 0U)
-   {
-      isWdgRst = TRUE;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      isWdgRst = FALSE;
-   }
-   return isWdgRst;
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      ActvDchaWdgDrvr_Refrsh
- * \\brief   This function will cyclically refresh the Watchdog
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-void ActvDchaWdgDrvr_Refrsh(void)
-{
-   __disable_irq();
-   /* disable global interrupts before refreshing Watchdog */
-
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-   /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:1.1  "Language extensions" */
-   /* PRQA S 0306 4 *//* PRQA S 0662 4 */
-   /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-    * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-   WDOG_CNT = 0x02A6U; /* write the 1st refresh word */
-   WDOG_CNT = 0x80B4U; /* write the 2nd refresh word to refresh counter */
-   /* enable global interrupts after refreshing Watchdog */
-   __enable_irq();
-}
-
-/******************************************************************/
-/*!
- * \\fn      ActvDchaWdgDrvr_Init(void)
- * \\brief   Watchdog Driver Initialization
- */
-/******************************************************************/
-Std_Return_Type ActvDchaWdgDrvr_Init(void)
-{
-   /* ******** Variables declaration *********** */
-   uint8 temp = 0U;
-   Std_Return_Type retVal = E_NOT_OK;
-   /* ************* Source code **************** */
-
-   if (ActDchaWdgDrvrCfg.Timeout >= ACTVDCH_WDGDRVR_MAX_ALLWD_TIMEOUT)
-   {
-      retVal = E_NOT_OK;
-   }
-   else
-   {
-      /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:11.3 "A cast should not be performed between a pointer type and an integral type." */
-      /*! \\misra Warning No C2004:1.1  "Language extensions" */
-      /* PRQA S 0306 16 *//* PRQA S 0662 16 */
-      /* Platform registers are accessed through macros containing pointers on this controller.
-       * As these point to 32bit values this operation is save here. */
-
-      WDOG_CNT = 0x20C5U; /* write the 1st unlock word */
-      WDOG_CNT = 0x28D9U; /* write the 2nd unlock word */
-
-      WDOG->TOVAL8B.TOVALL = (uint8) (0x00FFU & ActDchaWdgDrvrCfg.Timeout); /* write timeout value */
-      WDOG->TOVAL8B.TOVALH = (uint8) (0x00FFU & (ActDchaWdgDrvrCfg.Timeout >> 8));
-
-      temp = WDOG_CS2;
-      temp &= (uint8) ~(WDOG_CS2_CLK_MASK);
-      WDOG_CS2 = (uint8) (temp | (uint8) WDOG_CS2_CLK(ActDchaWdgDrvrCfg.ClkSel) | (uint8) WDOG_CS2_PRES_MASK); /* Bus Clock and set prescaler 256 */
-
-      temp = WDOG_CS1;
-      temp &= (uint8) ~(WDOG_CS1_UPDATE_MASK);
-      WDOG_CS1 = temp | WDOG_CS1_EN_MASK; /* enable WDT */
-
-      retVal = E_OK;
-   }
-   return retVal;
-}
-

-/* Prevention from multiple including the same memory map */
-#if !defined(MKE02Z2_H_) && !defined(MKE02Z4_H_) && !defined(SKEAZN642_H_)  /* Check if memory map has not been already included */
-#define MKE02Z2_H_
-#define MKE02Z4_H_
-#define SKEAZN642_H_
-#define MCU_MKE02Z2
-#define MCU_MKE02Z4
-#define MCU_SKEAZN642
-
-/* Check if another memory map has not been also included */
-#if (defined(MCU_ACTIVE))
-  #error SKEAZN642 memory map: There is already included another memory map. Only one memory map can be included.
-#endif /* (defined(MCU_ACTIVE)) */
-#define MCU_ACTIVE
-
-#include <stdint.h>

- * compatible) */
-#define MCU_MEM_MAP_VERSION 0x0100u

- * @{

-/** Interrupt Number Definitions */
-#define NUMBER_OF_INT_VECTORS 48                 /**< Number of interrupts in the Vector table */
-
-typedef enum IRQn {
-  /* Core interrupts */
-  NonMaskableInt_IRQn          = -14,              /**< Non Maskable Interrupt */
-  HardFault_IRQn               = -13,              /**< Cortex-M0 SV Hard Fault Interrupt */
-  SVCall_IRQn                  = -5,               /**< Cortex-M0 SV Call Interrupt */
-  PendSV_IRQn                  = -2,               /**< Cortex-M0 Pend SV Interrupt */
-  SysTick_IRQn                 = -1,               /**< Cortex-M0 System Tick Interrupt */
-
-  /* Device specific interrupts */
-  Reserved16_IRQn              = 0,                /**< Reserved interrupt 16 */
-  Reserved17_IRQn              = 1,                /**< Reserved interrupt 17 */
-  Reserved18_IRQn              = 2,                /**< Reserved interrupt 18 */
-  Reserved19_IRQn              = 3,                /**< Reserved interrupt 19 */
-  Reserved20_IRQn              = 4,                /**< Reserved interrupt 20 */
-  FTMRH_IRQn                   = 5,                /**< FTMRH command complete/read collision interrupt */
-  LVD_LVW_IRQn                 = 6,                /**< Low Voltage Detect, Low Voltage Warning */
-  IRQ_IRQn                     = 7,                /**< External interrupt */
-  I2C0_IRQn                    = 8,                /**< I2C0 interrupt */
-  Reserved25_IRQn              = 9,                /**< Reserved interrupt 25 */
-  SPI0_IRQn                    = 10,               /**< SPI0 interrupt */
-  SPI1_IRQn                    = 11,               /**< SPI1 interrupt */
-  UART0_IRQn                   = 12,               /**< UART0 status/error interrupt */
-  UART1_IRQn                   = 13,               /**< UART1 status/error interrupt */
-  UART2_IRQn                   = 14,               /**< UART2 status/error interrupt */
-  ADC0_IRQn                    = 15,               /**< ADC0 interrupt */
-  ACMP0_IRQn                   = 16,               /**< ACMP0 interrupt */
-  FTM0_IRQn                    = 17,               /**< FTM0 Single interrupt vector for all sources */
-  FTM1_IRQn                    = 18,               /**< FTM1 Single interrupt vector for all sources */
-  FTM2_IRQn                    = 19,               /**< FTM2 Single interrupt vector for all sources */
-  RTC_IRQn                     = 20,               /**< RTC overflow */
-  ACMP1_IRQn                   = 21,               /**< ACMP1 interrupt */
-  PIT_CH0_IRQn                 = 22,               /**< PIT CH0 overflow */
-  PIT_CH1_IRQn                 = 23,               /**< PIT CH1 overflow */
-  KBI0_IRQn                    = 24,               /**< Keyboard interrupt 0 */
-  KBI1_IRQn                    = 25,               /**< Keyboard interrupt 1 */
-  Reserved42_IRQn              = 26,               /**< Reserved interrupt 42 */
-  ICS_IRQn                     = 27,               /**< ICS interrupt */
-  Watchdog_IRQn                = 28,               /**< WDOG Interrupt */
-  Reserved45_IRQn              = 29,               /**< Reserved interrupt 45 */
-  Reserved46_IRQn              = 30,               /**< Reserved interrupt 46 */
-  Reserved47_IRQn              = 31                /**< Reserved interrupt 47 */
-} IRQn_Type;

-/** ACMP - Register Layout Typedef */
-typedef struct {
-  __IO uint8_t CS;                                 /**< ACMP Control and Status Register, offset: 0x0 */
-  __IO uint8_t C0;                                 /**< ACMP Control Register 0, offset: 0x1 */
-  __IO uint8_t C1;                                 /**< ACMP Control Register 1, offset: 0x2 */
-  __IO uint8_t C2;                                 /**< ACMP Control Register 2, offset: 0x3 */
-} ACMP_Type, *ACMP_MemMapPtr;
-
-/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-   -- ACMP - Register accessor macros
-   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
-
-/*!
- * @addtogroup ACMP_Register_Accessor_Macros ACMP - Register accessor macros
- * @{
- */
-
-
-/* ACMP - Register accessors */
-#define ACMP_CS_REG(base)                        ((base)->CS)
-#define ACMP_C0_REG(base)                        ((base)->C0)
-#define ACMP_C1_REG(base)                        ((base)->C1)
-#define ACMP_C2_REG(base)                        ((base)->C2)
-
-/*!
- * @}
- */ /* end of group ACMP_Register_Accessor_Macros */
-
-
-/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-   -- ACMP Register Masks
-   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
-
-/*!
- * @addtogroup ACMP_Register_Masks ACMP Register Masks
- * @{
- */
-
-/* CS Bit Fields */
-#define ACMP_CS_ACMOD_MASK                       0x3u
-#define ACMP_CS_ACMOD_SHIFT                      0
-#define ACMP_CS_ACMOD(x)                         (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<ACMP_CS_ACMOD_SHIFT))&ACMP_CS_ACMOD_MASK)
-#define ACMP_CS_ACOPE_MASK                       0x4u
-#define ACMP_CS_ACOPE_SHIFT                      2
-#define ACMP_CS_ACO_MASK                         0x8u
-#define ACMP_CS_ACO_SHIFT                        3
-#define ACMP_CS_ACIE_MASK                        0x10u
-#define ACMP_CS_ACIE_SHIFT                       4
-#define ACMP_CS_ACF_MASK                         0x20u
-#define ACMP_CS_ACF_SHIFT                        5
-#define ACMP_CS_HYST_MASK                        0x40u
-#define ACMP_CS_HYST_SHIFT                       6
-#define ACMP_CS_ACE_MASK                         0x80u
-#define ACMP_CS_ACE_SHIFT                        7
-/* C0 Bit Fields */
-#define ACMP_C0_ACNSEL_MASK                      0x3u
-#define ACMP_C0_ACNSEL_SHIFT                     0
-#define ACMP_C0_ACNSEL(x)                        (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<ACMP_C0_ACNSEL_SHIFT))&ACMP_C0_ACNSEL_MASK)
-#define ACMP_C0_ACPSEL_MASK                      0x30u
-#define ACMP_C0_ACPSEL_SHIFT                     4
-#define ACMP_C0_ACPSEL(x)                        (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<ACMP_C0_ACPSEL_SHIFT))&ACMP_C0_ACPSEL_MASK)
-/* C1 Bit Fields */
-#define ACMP_C1_DACVAL_MASK                      0x3Fu
-#define ACMP_C1_DACVAL_SHIFT                     0
-#define ACMP_C1_DACVAL(x)                        (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<ACMP_C1_DACVAL_SHIFT))&ACMP_C1_DACVAL_MASK)
-#define ACMP_C1_DACREF_MASK                      0x40u
-#define ACMP_C1_DACREF_SHIFT                     6
-#define ACMP_C1_DACEN_MASK                       0x80u
-#define ACMP_C1_DACEN_SHIFT                      7
-/* C2 Bit Fields */
-#define ACMP_C2_ACIPE_MASK                       0x7u
-#define ACMP_C2_ACIPE_SHIFT                      0
-#define ACMP_C2_ACIPE(x)                         (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<ACMP_C2_ACIPE_SHIFT))&ACMP_C2_ACIPE_MASK)
-
-/*!
- * @}
- */ /* end of group ACMP_Register_Masks */
-
-
-/* ACMP - Peripheral instance base addresses */
-/** Peripheral ACMP0 base address */
-#define ACMP0_BASE                               (0x40073000u)
-/** Peripheral ACMP0 base pointer */
-#define ACMP0                                    ((ACMP_Type *)ACMP0_BASE)
-#define ACMP0_BASE_PTR                           (ACMP0)
-/** Peripheral ACMP1 base address */
-#define ACMP1_BASE                               (0x40074000u)
-/** Peripheral ACMP1 base pointer */
-#define ACMP1                                    ((ACMP_Type *)ACMP1_BASE)
-#define ACMP1_BASE_PTR                           (ACMP1)
-/** Array initializer of ACMP peripheral base addresses */
-#define ACMP_BASE_ADDRS                          { ACMP0_BASE, ACMP1_BASE }
-/** Array initializer of ACMP peripheral base pointers */
-#define ACMP_BASE_PTRS                           { ACMP0, ACMP1 }
-

-   -- ACMP - Register accessor macros

-/* ACMP - Register instance definitions */

-#define ACMP0_C0                                 ACMP_C0_REG(ACMP0)
-#define ACMP0_C1                                 ACMP_C1_REG(ACMP0)
-#define ACMP0_C2                                 ACMP_C2_REG(ACMP0)
-/* ACMP1 */

-#define ACMP1_C0                                 ACMP_C0_REG(ACMP1)
-#define ACMP1_C1                                 ACMP_C1_REG(ACMP1)
-#define ACMP1_C2                                 ACMP_C2_REG(ACMP1)

-/*!

- * @{

-
-/** ADC - Register Layout Typedef */
-typedef struct {
-  __IO uint32_t SC1;                               /**< Status and Control Register 1, offset: 0x0 */
-  __IO uint32_t SC2;                               /**< Status and Control Register 2, offset: 0x4 */
-  __IO uint32_t SC3;                               /**< Status and Control Register 3, offset: 0x8 */
-  __IO uint32_t SC4;                               /**< Status and Control Register 4, offset: 0xC */
-  __I  uint32_t R;                                 /**< Conversion Result Register, offset: 0x10 */
-  __IO uint32_t CV;                                /**< Compare Value Register, offset: 0x14 */
-  __IO uint32_t APCTL1;                            /**< Pin Control 1 Register, offset: 0x18 */
-} ADC_Type, *ADC_MemMapPtr;
-
-/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-   -- ADC - Register accessor macros
-   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
-
-/*!
- * @addtogroup ADC_Register_Accessor_Macros ADC - Register accessor macros
- * @{
- */
-
-
-/* ADC - Register accessors */
-#define ADC_SC1_REG(base)                        ((base)->SC1)
-#define ADC_SC2_REG(base)                        ((base)->SC2)
-#define ADC_SC3_REG(base)                        ((base)->SC3)
-#define ADC_SC4_REG(base)                        ((base)->SC4)
-#define ADC_R_REG(base)                          ((base)->R)
-#define ADC_CV_REG(base)                         ((base)->CV)
-#define ADC_APCTL1_REG(base)                     ((base)->APCTL1)
-
-/*!
- * @}
- */ /* end of group ADC_Register_Accessor_Macros */

-/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-   -- ADC Register Masks
-   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

-/*!
- * @addtogroup ADC_Register_Masks ADC Register Masks
- * @{
- */
-
-/* SC1 Bit Fields */
-#define ADC_SC1_ADCH_MASK                        0x1Fu
-#define ADC_SC1_ADCH_SHIFT                       0
-#define ADC_SC1_ADCH(x)                          (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<ADC_SC1_ADCH_SHIFT))&ADC_SC1_ADCH_MASK)
-#define ADC_SC1_ADCO_MASK                        0x20u
-#define ADC_SC1_ADCO_SHIFT                       5
-#define ADC_SC1_AIEN_MASK                        0x40u
-#define ADC_SC1_AIEN_SHIFT                       6
-#define ADC_SC1_COCO_MASK                        0x80u
-#define ADC_SC1_COCO_SHIFT                       7
-/* SC2 Bit Fields */
-#define ADC_SC2_REFSEL_MASK                      0x3u
-#define ADC_SC2_REFSEL_SHIFT                     0
-#define ADC_SC2_REFSEL(x)                        (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<ADC_SC2_REFSEL_SHIFT))&ADC_SC2_REFSEL_MASK)
-#define ADC_SC2_FFULL_MASK                       0x4u
-#define ADC_SC2_FFULL_SHIFT                      2
-#define ADC_SC2_FEMPTY_MASK                      0x8u
-#define ADC_SC2_FEMPTY_SHIFT                     3
-#define ADC_SC2_ACFGT_MASK                       0x10u
-#define ADC_SC2_ACFGT_SHIFT                      4
-#define ADC_SC2_ACFE_MASK                        0x20u
-#define ADC_SC2_ACFE_SHIFT                       5
-#define ADC_SC2_ADTRG_MASK                       0x40u
-#define ADC_SC2_ADTRG_SHIFT                      6
-#define ADC_SC2_ADACT_MASK                       0x80u
-#define ADC_SC2_ADACT_SHIFT                      7
-/* SC3 Bit Fields */
-#define ADC_SC3_ADICLK_MASK                      0x3u
-#define ADC_SC3_ADICLK_SHIFT                     0
-#define ADC_SC3_ADICLK(x)                        (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<ADC_SC3_ADICLK_SHIFT))&ADC_SC3_ADICLK_MASK)
-#define ADC_SC3_MODE_MASK                        0xCu
-#define ADC_SC3_MODE_SHIFT                       2
-#define ADC_SC3_MODE(x)                          (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<ADC_SC3_MODE_SHIFT))&ADC_SC3_MODE_MASK)
-#define ADC_SC3_ADLSMP_MASK                      0x10u
-#define ADC_SC3_ADLSMP_SHIFT                     4
-#define ADC_SC3_ADIV_MASK                        0x60u
-#define ADC_SC3_ADIV_SHIFT                       5
-#define ADC_SC3_ADIV(x)                          (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<ADC_SC3_ADIV_SHIFT))&ADC_SC3_ADIV_MASK)
-#define ADC_SC3_ADLPC_MASK                       0x80u
-#define ADC_SC3_ADLPC_SHIFT                      7
-/* SC4 Bit Fields */
-#define ADC_SC4_AFDEP_MASK                       0x7u
-#define ADC_SC4_AFDEP_SHIFT                      0
-#define ADC_SC4_AFDEP(x)                         (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<ADC_SC4_AFDEP_SHIFT))&ADC_SC4_AFDEP_MASK)
-#define ADC_SC4_ACFSEL_MASK                      0x20u
-#define ADC_SC4_ACFSEL_SHIFT                     5
-#define ADC_SC4_ASCANE_MASK                      0x40u
-#define ADC_SC4_ASCANE_SHIFT                     6
-/* R Bit Fields */
-#define ADC_R_ADR_MASK                           0xFFFu
-#define ADC_R_ADR_SHIFT                          0
-#define ADC_R_ADR(x)                             (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<ADC_R_ADR_SHIFT))&ADC_R_ADR_MASK)
-/* CV Bit Fields */
-#define ADC_CV_CV_MASK                           0xFFFu
-#define ADC_CV_CV_SHIFT                          0
-#define ADC_CV_CV(x)                             (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<ADC_CV_CV_SHIFT))&ADC_CV_CV_MASK)
-/* APCTL1 Bit Fields */
-#define ADC_APCTL1_ADPC_MASK                     0xFFFFu
-#define ADC_APCTL1_ADPC_SHIFT                    0
-#define ADC_APCTL1_ADPC(x)                       (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<ADC_APCTL1_ADPC_SHIFT))&ADC_APCTL1_ADPC_MASK)
-
-/*!
- * @}
- */ /* end of group ADC_Register_Masks */

-#define ADC_BASE_PTR                             (ADC)

-/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-   -- CRC Peripheral Access Layer
-   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
-
-/*!
- * @addtogroup CRC_Peripheral_Access_Layer CRC Peripheral Access Layer
- * @{
- */
-
-/** CRC - Register Layout Typedef */
-typedef struct {
-  union {                                          /* offset: 0x0 */
-    struct {                                         /* offset: 0x0 */
-      __IO uint16_t DATAL;                             /**< CRC_DATAL register., offset: 0x0 */
-      __IO uint16_t DATAH;                             /**< CRC_DATAH register., offset: 0x2 */
-    } ACCESS16BIT;
-    __IO uint32_t DATA;                              /**< CRC Data register, offset: 0x0 */
-    struct {                                         /* offset: 0x0 */
-      __IO uint8_t DATALL;                             /**< CRC_DATALL register., offset: 0x0 */
-      __IO uint8_t DATALU;                             /**< CRC_DATALU register., offset: 0x1 */
-      __IO uint8_t DATAHL;                             /**< CRC_DATAHL register., offset: 0x2 */
-      __IO uint8_t DATAHU;                             /**< CRC_DATAHU register., offset: 0x3 */
-    } ACCESS8BIT;
-  };
-  union {                                          /* offset: 0x4 */
-    struct {                                         /* offset: 0x4 */
-      __IO uint16_t GPOLYL;                            /**< CRC_GPOLYL register., offset: 0x4 */
-      __IO uint16_t GPOLYH;                            /**< CRC_GPOLYH register., offset: 0x6 */
-    } GPOLY_ACCESS16BIT;
-    __IO uint32_t GPOLY;                             /**< CRC Polynomial register, offset: 0x4 */
-    struct {                                         /* offset: 0x4 */
-      __IO uint8_t GPOLYLL;                            /**< CRC_GPOLYLL register., offset: 0x4 */
-      __IO uint8_t GPOLYLU;                            /**< CRC_GPOLYLU register., offset: 0x5 */
-      __IO uint8_t GPOLYHL;                            /**< CRC_GPOLYHL register., offset: 0x6 */
-      __IO uint8_t GPOLYHU;                            /**< CRC_GPOLYHU register., offset: 0x7 */
-    } GPOLY_ACCESS8BIT;
-  };
-  union {                                          /* offset: 0x8 */
-    __IO uint32_t CTRL;                              /**< CRC Control register, offset: 0x8 */
-    struct {                                         /* offset: 0x8 */
-           uint8_t RESERVED_0[3];
-      __IO uint8_t CTRLHU;                             /**< CRC_CTRLHU register., offset: 0xB */
-    } CTRL_ACCESS8BIT;
-  };
-} CRC_Type, *CRC_MemMapPtr;
-
-/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-   -- CRC - Register accessor macros
-   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
-
-/*!
- * @addtogroup CRC_Register_Accessor_Macros CRC - Register accessor macros
- * @{
- */
-
-
-/* CRC - Register accessors */
-#define CRC_DATAL_REG(base)                      ((base)->ACCESS16BIT.DATAL)
-#define CRC_DATAH_REG(base)                      ((base)->ACCESS16BIT.DATAH)
-#define CRC_DATA_REG(base)                       ((base)->DATA)
-#define CRC_DATALL_REG(base)                     ((base)->ACCESS8BIT.DATALL)
-#define CRC_DATALU_REG(base)                     ((base)->ACCESS8BIT.DATALU)
-#define CRC_DATAHL_REG(base)                     ((base)->ACCESS8BIT.DATAHL)
-#define CRC_DATAHU_REG(base)                     ((base)->ACCESS8BIT.DATAHU)
-#define CRC_GPOLYL_REG(base)                     ((base)->GPOLY_ACCESS16BIT.GPOLYL)
-#define CRC_GPOLYH_REG(base)                     ((base)->GPOLY_ACCESS16BIT.GPOLYH)
-#define CRC_GPOLY_REG(base)                      ((base)->GPOLY)
-#define CRC_GPOLYLL_REG(base)                    ((base)->GPOLY_ACCESS8BIT.GPOLYLL)
-#define CRC_GPOLYLU_REG(base)                    ((base)->GPOLY_ACCESS8BIT.GPOLYLU)
-#define CRC_GPOLYHL_REG(base)                    ((base)->GPOLY_ACCESS8BIT.GPOLYHL)
-#define CRC_GPOLYHU_REG(base)                    ((base)->GPOLY_ACCESS8BIT.GPOLYHU)
-#define CRC_CTRL_REG(base)                       ((base)->CTRL)
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_REG(base)                     ((base)->CTRL_ACCESS8BIT.CTRLHU)
-
-/*!
- * @}
- */ /* end of group CRC_Register_Accessor_Macros */
-

-/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-   -- CRC Register Masks
-   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
-
-/*!
- * @addtogroup CRC_Register_Masks CRC Register Masks
- * @{
- */
-
-/* DATAL Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_DATAL_DATAL_MASK                     0xFFFFu
-#define CRC_DATAL_DATAL_SHIFT                    0
-#define CRC_DATAL_DATAL(x)                       (((uint16_t)(((uint16_t)(x))<<CRC_DATAL_DATAL_SHIFT))&CRC_DATAL_DATAL_MASK)
-/* DATAH Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_DATAH_DATAH_MASK                     0xFFFFu
-#define CRC_DATAH_DATAH_SHIFT                    0
-#define CRC_DATAH_DATAH(x)                       (((uint16_t)(((uint16_t)(x))<<CRC_DATAH_DATAH_SHIFT))&CRC_DATAH_DATAH_MASK)
-/* DATA Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_DATA_LL_MASK                         0xFFu
-#define CRC_DATA_LL_SHIFT                        0
-#define CRC_DATA_LL(x)                           (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<CRC_DATA_LL_SHIFT))&CRC_DATA_LL_MASK)
-#define CRC_DATA_LU_MASK                         0xFF00u
-#define CRC_DATA_LU_SHIFT                        8
-#define CRC_DATA_LU(x)                           (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<CRC_DATA_LU_SHIFT))&CRC_DATA_LU_MASK)
-#define CRC_DATA_HL_MASK                         0xFF0000u
-#define CRC_DATA_HL_SHIFT                        16
-#define CRC_DATA_HL(x)                           (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<CRC_DATA_HL_SHIFT))&CRC_DATA_HL_MASK)
-#define CRC_DATA_HU_MASK                         0xFF000000u
-#define CRC_DATA_HU_SHIFT                        24
-#define CRC_DATA_HU(x)                           (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<CRC_DATA_HU_SHIFT))&CRC_DATA_HU_MASK)
-/* DATALL Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_DATALL_DATALL_MASK                   0xFFu
-#define CRC_DATALL_DATALL_SHIFT                  0
-#define CRC_DATALL_DATALL(x)                     (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<CRC_DATALL_DATALL_SHIFT))&CRC_DATALL_DATALL_MASK)
-/* DATALU Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_DATALU_DATALU_MASK                   0xFFu
-#define CRC_DATALU_DATALU_SHIFT                  0
-#define CRC_DATALU_DATALU(x)                     (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<CRC_DATALU_DATALU_SHIFT))&CRC_DATALU_DATALU_MASK)
-/* DATAHL Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_DATAHL_DATAHL_MASK                   0xFFu
-#define CRC_DATAHL_DATAHL_SHIFT                  0
-#define CRC_DATAHL_DATAHL(x)                     (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<CRC_DATAHL_DATAHL_SHIFT))&CRC_DATAHL_DATAHL_MASK)
-/* DATAHU Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_DATAHU_DATAHU_MASK                   0xFFu
-#define CRC_DATAHU_DATAHU_SHIFT                  0
-#define CRC_DATAHU_DATAHU(x)                     (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<CRC_DATAHU_DATAHU_SHIFT))&CRC_DATAHU_DATAHU_MASK)
-/* GPOLYL Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_GPOLYL_GPOLYL_MASK                   0xFFFFu
-#define CRC_GPOLYL_GPOLYL_SHIFT                  0
-#define CRC_GPOLYL_GPOLYL(x)                     (((uint16_t)(((uint16_t)(x))<<CRC_GPOLYL_GPOLYL_SHIFT))&CRC_GPOLYL_GPOLYL_MASK)
-/* GPOLYH Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_GPOLYH_GPOLYH_MASK                   0xFFFFu
-#define CRC_GPOLYH_GPOLYH_SHIFT                  0
-#define CRC_GPOLYH_GPOLYH(x)                     (((uint16_t)(((uint16_t)(x))<<CRC_GPOLYH_GPOLYH_SHIFT))&CRC_GPOLYH_GPOLYH_MASK)
-/* GPOLY Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_GPOLY_LOW_MASK                       0xFFFFu
-#define CRC_GPOLY_LOW_SHIFT                      0
-#define CRC_GPOLY_LOW(x)                         (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<CRC_GPOLY_LOW_SHIFT))&CRC_GPOLY_LOW_MASK)
-#define CRC_GPOLY_HIGH_MASK                      0xFFFF0000u
-#define CRC_GPOLY_HIGH_SHIFT                     16
-#define CRC_GPOLY_HIGH(x)                        (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<CRC_GPOLY_HIGH_SHIFT))&CRC_GPOLY_HIGH_MASK)
-/* GPOLYLL Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_GPOLYLL_GPOLYLL_MASK                 0xFFu
-#define CRC_GPOLYLL_GPOLYLL_SHIFT                0
-#define CRC_GPOLYLL_GPOLYLL(x)                   (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<CRC_GPOLYLL_GPOLYLL_SHIFT))&CRC_GPOLYLL_GPOLYLL_MASK)
-/* GPOLYLU Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_GPOLYLU_GPOLYLU_MASK                 0xFFu
-#define CRC_GPOLYLU_GPOLYLU_SHIFT                0
-#define CRC_GPOLYLU_GPOLYLU(x)                   (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<CRC_GPOLYLU_GPOLYLU_SHIFT))&CRC_GPOLYLU_GPOLYLU_MASK)
-/* GPOLYHL Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_GPOLYHL_GPOLYHL_MASK                 0xFFu
-#define CRC_GPOLYHL_GPOLYHL_SHIFT                0
-#define CRC_GPOLYHL_GPOLYHL(x)                   (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<CRC_GPOLYHL_GPOLYHL_SHIFT))&CRC_GPOLYHL_GPOLYHL_MASK)
-/* GPOLYHU Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_GPOLYHU_GPOLYHU_MASK                 0xFFu
-#define CRC_GPOLYHU_GPOLYHU_SHIFT                0
-#define CRC_GPOLYHU_GPOLYHU(x)                   (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<CRC_GPOLYHU_GPOLYHU_SHIFT))&CRC_GPOLYHU_GPOLYHU_MASK)
-/* CTRL Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_CTRL_TCRC_MASK                       0x1000000u
-#define CRC_CTRL_TCRC_SHIFT                      24
-#define CRC_CTRL_WAS_MASK                        0x2000000u
-#define CRC_CTRL_WAS_SHIFT                       25
-#define CRC_CTRL_FXOR_MASK                       0x4000000u
-#define CRC_CTRL_FXOR_SHIFT                      26
-#define CRC_CTRL_TOTR_MASK                       0x30000000u
-#define CRC_CTRL_TOTR_SHIFT                      28
-#define CRC_CTRL_TOTR(x)                         (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<CRC_CTRL_TOTR_SHIFT))&CRC_CTRL_TOTR_MASK)
-#define CRC_CTRL_TOT_MASK                        0xC0000000u
-#define CRC_CTRL_TOT_SHIFT                       30
-#define CRC_CTRL_TOT(x)                          (((uint32_t)(((uint32_t)(x))<<CRC_CTRL_TOT_SHIFT))&CRC_CTRL_TOT_MASK)
-/* CTRLHU Bit Fields */
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_TCRC_MASK                     0x1u
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_TCRC_SHIFT                    0
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_WAS_MASK                      0x2u
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_WAS_SHIFT                     1
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_FXOR_MASK                     0x4u
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_FXOR_SHIFT                    2
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_TOTR_MASK                     0x30u
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_TOTR_SHIFT                    4
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_TOTR(x)                       (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<CRC_CTRLHU_TOTR_SHIFT))&CRC_CTRLHU_TOTR_MASK)
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_TOT_MASK                      0xC0u
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_TOT_SHIFT                     6
-#define CRC_CTRLHU_TOT(x)                        (((uint8_t)(((uint8_t)(x))<<CRC_CTRLHU_TOT_SHIFT))&CRC_CTRLHU_TOT_MASK)
-
-/*!
- * @}
- */ /* end of group CRC_Register_Masks */
-
-
-/* CRC - Peripheral instance base addresses */
-/** Peripheral CRC base address */
-#define CRC_BASE                                 (0x40032000u)
-/** Peripheral CRC base pointer */
-#define CRC0                                     ((CRC_Type *)CRC_BASE)
-#define CRC_BASE_PTR                             (CRC0)
-/** Array initializer of CRC peripheral base addresses */
-#define CRC_BASE_ADDRS                           { CRC_BASE }
-/** Array initializer of CRC peripheral base pointers */
-#define CRC_BASE_PTRS                            { CRC0 }
-
-/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-   -- CRC - Register accessor macros
-   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
-
-/*!
- * @addtogroup CRC_Register_Accessor_Macros CRC - Register accessor macros
- * @{

-

-/* CRC - Register instance definitions */
-/* CRC */
-#define CRC_DATA                                 CRC_DATA_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_DATAL                                CRC_DATAL_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_DATALL                               CRC_DATALL_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_DATALU                               CRC_DATALU_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_DATAH                                CRC_DATAH_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_DATAHL                               CRC_DATAHL_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_DATAHU                               CRC_DATAHU_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_GPOLY                                CRC_GPOLY_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_GPOLYL                               CRC_GPOLYL_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_GPOLYLL                              CRC_GPOLYLL_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_GPOLYLU                              CRC_GPOLYLU_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_GPOLYH                               CRC_GPOLYH_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_GPOLYHL                              CRC_GPOLYHL_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_GPOLYHU                              CRC_GPOLYHU_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_CTRL                                 CRC_CTRL_REG(CRC0)
-#define CRC_CTRLHU                               CRC_CTRLHU_REG(CRC0)

-/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-   -- FGPIO Peripheral Access Layer
-   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
-
-/*!
- * @addtogroup FGPIO_Peripheral_Access_Layer FGPIO Peripheral Access Layer
- * @{
- */
-
-/** FGPIO - Register Layout Typedef */
-typedef struct {
-  __IO uint32_t PDOR;                              /**< Port Data Output Register, offset: 0x0 */
-  __O  uint32_t PSOR;                              /**< Port Set Output Register, offset: 0x4 */
-  __O  uint32_t PCOR;                              /**< Port Clear Output Register, offset: 0x8 */
-  __O  uint32_t PTOR;                              /**< Port Toggle Output Register, offset: 0xC */
-  __I  uint32_t PDIR;                              /**< Port Data Input Register, offset: 0x10 */
-  __IO uint32_t PDDR;                              /**< Port Data Direction Register, offset: 0x14 */
-  __IO uint32_t PIDR;                              /**< Port Input Disable Register, offset: 0x18 */
-} FGPIO_Type, *FGPIO_MemMapPtr;
-
-/* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-   -- FGPIO - Register accessor macros
-   ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
-
-/*!
- * @addtogroup FGPIO_Register_Accessor_Macros FGPIO - Register accessor macros
- * @{
- */
-
-
-/* FGPIO - Register accessors */
-#define FGPIO_PDOR_REG(base)                     ((base)->PDOR)
-#define FGPIO_PSOR_REG(base)                     ((base)->PSOR)
-#define FGPIO_PCOR_REG(base)                     ((base)->PCOR)
-#define FGPIO_PTOR_REG(base)                     ((base)->PTOR)
-#define FGPIO_PDIR_REG(base)                     ((base)->PDIR)
-#define FGPIO_PDDR_REG(base)                     ((base)->PDDR)
-#define FGPIO_PIDR_REG(base)                     ((base)->PIDR)
-
-/*!
- * @}
- */ /* end of group FGPIO_Register_Accessor_Macros */
-
